ref.div: Steinlechner S, Stieglitz A, Ruf T, Heldmaier G, Reiter RJ (1991) Integration of environmental signals by the pineal gland and its significance for seasonality in small mammals. In: Fraschini F, Reiter RJ, editors. Role of melatonin and pineal peptides in neuroimmunomodulation. New York: Plenum Press.
